mapper.sql: PARENT_ID, NAME, SEQ, DISABLED, DELETED, REMARK, ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.select: WITH LINK(ID, PARENT_ID) AS ( SELECT t1.ID, t1.PARENT_ID, t1.NAME, t1.SEQ, t1.DISABLED, t1.DELETED, t1.REMARK, t1.CREATE_BY, t1.CREATE_TIME, t1.UPDATE_BY, t1.UPDATE_TIME FROM VTL_DEPT t1 WHERE t1.ID = #{childrenId} AND t1.DISABLED = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT t2.ID, t2.PARENT_ID, t2.NAME, t2.SEQ, t2.DISABLED, t1.DELETED, t2.REMARK, t2.CREATE_BY, t2.CREATE_TIME, t2.UPDATE_BY, t2.UPDATE_TIME FROM LINK link INNER JOIN VTL_DEPT t2 ON link.PARENT_ID = t2.ID ) SELECT * FROM LINK ORDER BY ID

WITH LINK(ID, PARENT_ID) AS ( SELECT t1.ID, t1.PARENT_ID, t1.NAME, t1.SEQ, t1.DISABLED, t1.DELETED, t1.REMARK, t1.CREATE_BY, t1.CREATE_TIME, t1.UPDATE_BY, t1.UPDATE_TIME FROM VTL_DEPT t1 WHERE t1.PARENT_ID = #{parentId} AND t1.DISABLED = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT t2.ID, t2.PARENT_ID, t2.NAME, t2.SEQ, t2.DISABLED, t1.DELETED, t2.REMARK, t2.CREATE_BY, t2.CREATE_TIME, t2.UPDATE_BY, t2.UPDATE_TIME FROM LINK link INNER JOIN VTL_DEPT t2 ON link.ID = t2.PARENT_ID ) SELECT * FROM LINK ORDER BY ID

SELECT d.PARENT_ID, d.NAME, d.SEQ, d.DISABLED, d.DELETED, d.REMARK, d.ID, d.CREATE_BY, d.CREATE_TIME, d.UPDATE_BY, d.UPDATE_TIME FROM VTL_DEPT d INNER JOIN VTL_USER_DEPT ud ON ud.DEPT_ID = d.ID WHERE ud.USER_ID = #{userId}
